# get AIC

```{r}
getAIC <- function(model){
  return(2*length(coef(model))-(2*summary(model)@m2logL/-2))
}
```


```{r}
getAIC(m0)
getAIC(m1)
getAIC(m2)
getAIC(m3)
getAIC(m3a)
getAIC(m4)
getAIC(m4a)
```

# AIC table

```{r}
model_list <- list(m0, m1, m2, m3, m4, m5b, m5c, m6b, m6c, m7b, m7c, m7d, m7e)
AICtab(model_list, logLik=T, base=T)
```
